TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridPageChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 事件資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的頁面上選取項目中的按鈕時引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a button in the page selection element of the control is clicked. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它會顯示頁面10 項目為增量來控制。It displays pages on the control in 10-item increments. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[PageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageIndexChanged/CS/datagridpageindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageIndexChanged/VB/datagridpageindexchangedvb.aspx#1)]

param.name: newPageIndex
param.span: 在 控制項的頁面選取項目中，使用者所選取的頁面索引。

span.span: The index of the page selected by the user from the page selection element of the control.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 執行個體時建立呼叫這個建構函式時，由下列屬性會初始化為指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values. |屬性Properties|Initial valueInitial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`commandSource` 參數。The `commandSource` parameter.| ||`newPageIndex` 參數。The `newPageIndex` parameter.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class. [!code-csharp[Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridPageChangedEventArgs.DataGridPageChangedEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandSource As Object
public: property System::Object ^ CommandSource { System::Object ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the source of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷命令引發事件的來源。Use the property to determine the source of the command that raised the event. 因為的頁面上選取項目中的按鈕時才會引發這個事件按一下控制項時，傳回的來源是表示頁面的選取項目的物件。Because this event is raised only when a button in the page selection element of the control is clicked, the returned source is a object that represents the page selection element. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以程式設計方式控制命令來源引發事件的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the command source that raises the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewPageIndex As Integer
public: property int NewPageIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得在 控制項的頁面選取項目中，使用者所選取頁面的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control.

value.span: 在 控制項的頁面選取項目中，使用者所選取頁面的索引。

span.span: The index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷使用者的頁面上選取項目中所選取的頁面索引控制項。Use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control. 這個值通常用來設定屬性控制項來顯示選取的頁面。This value is often used to set the property of the control to display the selected page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷使用者的頁面上選取項目中所選取的頁面索引控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the page selected by the user in the page selection element of the control. 此值，然後用來設定屬性控制項來顯示選取的頁面。This value is then used to set the property of the control to display the selected page. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/CS/datagridallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridAllowPaging/VB/datagridallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]
